name: 5 demons and a spooky castle
description:
Your 1 billion dollars in debt cause your forgot to pay 25 years of taxes to the seven deadly sins so you decide to do a spell but whoops you were on the wrong page and now your in a spooky castle. Happens to the best of us.

Hi, this is something I made for Halloween, It is also really challenging at times.

It can be beaten in a few hours if you know what your doing.

Note that most of this game is just experimenting with the engine and just seeing what works and what does not, so the game

might be inconsistent at times. I probably won't come back to fix anything unless it's a game breaking glitch cause I'm just tired of working on this, honestly whether people come to hate or like this game I'm just glad i actually released something. Anyway have a happy Halloween!
